p: The FTIR analysis of DEET ( Figure 3D) showed multiple absorptions peaks at 2972 cm -1 and 2875 cm -1 characterized by the aliphatic C-H stretching vibration. The absorption peak at 1628 cm -1 was associated with the –C = C stretching of the aromatic group. Several peaks between 1500 cm -1 and 1000 cm -1 were assigned to the vibration of the C-C and C-H group. The vibration peaks from 945 to 456 were associated with the ‘oop’ = C-H stretch bending.
